New Records: Sese Bau became the second Papua New Guinea batter to hit a fifty in the T20 World Cup after Assad Vala's achievement in 2021.
Key Match Events: Sese Bau played a fine knock of 50 runs against co-hosts West Indies in the Group C opener.
PNG's innings started on a shaky note, reaching 50 for four after early breakthroughs by West Indies bowlers.
Sese Bau's 50-run partnership with Charles Amini (12) proved crucial in stabilizing PNG's innings.
